/** * load a input {@link InputStream} to be a map {@link Map}, you have to close the inputStream by yourself, such as:
*

try (InputStream in = url.openStream()) {
*      configMap.putAll(YAMLUtil.yaml2Properties(in));
* }

*

try (InputStream in = url.openStream()) {
- *      configMap.putAll(YAMLUtil.yaml2Properties(in));
- * }
+ *      configMap.putAll(YAMLUtil.yaml2Properties(in));
+ * }
*
